segments.text: David , what have you been up to lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went on a trip with my family last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What cities did you go to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: London , Paris and a few other cities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , We didn't go there . I'd like to go there next time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think this summer is a good time to visit Berlin . It's a beautiful place and the people there are very nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went there last year . If you want , I can give you some information I have about the city .
segments.speaker: S1
